title: Hot cold, lukewarm
content:
Given your favourate drink at any random time of the day, would you like it hot, cold, or lukewarm [inbetween, not quite hot, not quite cold]

Just want to know.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Cold.
content:
Well, my favourite drink is orange juice (pure, organic--none of that dodgy stuff you find on supermarket shelves), which would be extremely unpleasant at anything other than cold. Preferably on the rocks, too.

Mmm... I'm gonna walk to my fridge and get me some now.

title: Re: Cold.
content:
Well, I prefer my lemonade cold.. I dislike hot drinks, such as juice that has been in a glass over the night.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Cold.
content:
Hmm...

I usually like my water to be hot and or lukewarm when I drink it.-----------------------

title: Re: Cold.
content:

title: Re: Cold.
content:
Depends.

Favourite drink? I have none, to be honest. But also to be honest, I like few things lukewarm.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: bah
content: I don't care what it is, it's not cold enough. Ever. Brainfreezes are something I experience rarely, (shut up, LevelLord,) so I'm always eager to see if I can find something capable of delivering reliably.

title: Re: bah
content:
Nothing like a tall glass of lukewarm water.________________

title: Re: bah

content:

Most other drinks (soda, juice, etc.) I prefer cold.Retodon8

I also like shakes cold

And water cold - lukewarm

I even like my coffee cold (Frap anyone?)
